Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Oh Commandant, you're here... great.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As you move through the hallways, you stumble into Lucia, who seems to be looking for you.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Sorry, Commandant... for running out on you earlier.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's okay.", 3: '8', 4: 'What happened back there?', 5: '9'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Just a small internal malfunction.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It\'s hard to explain, but touching your hand seemed to accelerate this frame\'s heartbeat... Well, "heartbeat" might be an inaccurate term.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That is, my M.I.N.D. was just overwhelmed by a wave of unknown fluctuations that didn't match with the memory data I have.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'These fluctuations did exist in the data from the previous frame, but they were flagged as errors and dismissed...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...But I didn't expect the last flux to be so volatile. What came over me? Why did I suggest something like holding hands...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't think the old me ever said anything like that, right Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I think she did.', 3: '15', 4: "Don't think so...?", 5: '16'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "H-huh... really? I can't seem to find the relevant logs... Unless you're toying with me, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I thought so too. Maybe it's a compiling error from reordering memory files.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Though, to be honest, the more I try to adapt to the old me, the more distant I feel from her... hence, these strange actions I'm prone to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Holding hands was one of them. The incident with Karenina was another...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It went like this... I was on my way down to Tech for routine maintenance after a training session...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "You're not getting away this time, Lucia! Get ready and put 'em up!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm gonna beat you this time!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Okay, sure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Tch, you coward! You—wait, h-huh?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I thought that responding to Karenina that way would satisfy her, but instead we stared daggers at each other for what felt like hours, until she finally had enough and left...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So refusing her, just as I always had, was the right choice?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Probably.', 3: '27', 4: 'Do what you think is best.', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I see... I have much to learn about my companions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What I think is best... You never make it easy, do you, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But then I'll have to spend more time familiarizing myself with personality data that aren't yours, Commandant...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, you're surrounded by so many... amazing people. If I don't hurry and become myself again, I might lose you forever...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Halfway through, Lucia seems to have entered into a world of her own and begins murmuring to herself—brows furrowed, lips pursed.'}
{2: "I'm still here, Lucia. Not going anywhere...", 3: '32', 4: "That won't happen.", 5: '32'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Mh-hm, yeah... Why am I even worrying...? Hmm...', 4: '1'}
